com.chaining

Class Collector<T>

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.chaining.Collector<T>
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    And<T>, Monad<java.util.List<T>>

    public class Collector<T>
extends java.lang.Object
implements And<T>, Monad<java.util.List<T>>
    a class that keeps collecting new items into a list then returns the new List on request

    Created by Ahmed Adel Ismail on 11/13/2017.
